cab.content: OPERATIONS.From:- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To:^ C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in 11.50 p.rru 10th December 1917.Received 11.30 a.m. 11th December 1917.10029. December 10th cipher. Situation evening.3rd Army. Italians recaptured bridgehead at Caposile during the night of December 9th/Dec, 10th taking 32 prisoners and machine guns. Nothing important on res.t of front *4th Army. Situation unchanged,1st Army. Afternoon December 9th enemy artillery rather active on 26th Corps front. Fire reported to be of registering nature. Quiet night. Slight artillery activity on rest of front,3rd G orps. Norma1.Aerial Activity. Two enemy aeroplanes and one kite balloon brought down.
